vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.8;
father of: Uzziel (H5816L)
§ Harhaiah = "fear of Jehovah"
father of Uzziel who was one of the builders of the wall in Nehemiah's time
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Uziel, orfebre, post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈海雅 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "敬畏耶和華"
烏薛的父親,其為尼希米時期城牆的建造者 (尼3:8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈海雅 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "敬畏耶和华"
乌薛的父亲,其为尼希米时期城墙的建造者 (尼3:8)
